name: biurad/http-galaxy
description: Http Galaxy: abstraction for HTTP request, response, and csp protection. Provides careful data sanitization and utility for URL and cookies manipulation.

suggest.psr/cache: To use the Cache Session Handler and/or cache PSR-15 middleware
suggest.symfony/cache: To use the Cache Session Handler and/or cache PSR-15 middleware
suggest.symfony-http-client: To use the Symfony PHP HTTP client library
suggest.symfony/web-link: To use PSR-13 link in application
suggest.yiisoft/network-utilities: To use Network related utilities for IP and DNS
